mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, null, null, DEFAULT, 'https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSoPUWDZ44uXiwqS_ZXtyreQqPbTStyav_vX-gxuvzZlt9nXcBU5nnx_4wZ3lz1hsos1To-G2IgVWk3HFVTn16tXgmoom4Bvxslt4PUE6yd', #{email})
